item.title: Self documenting API with swagger (OpenAPI 3.0) documentation
item.description: Overview API documentation is one of the crucial point during development of the application. The contracted API let development teams to work on different pieces of application, without risk of failure during integration. API contract also defines endpoint interaction results, such as status codes and business reasons for them. Design first vs Code First approach In case of designing software, we need to choose one of the API design approach.
